Generated Narrative: ValueSet mif-conceptRelationshipKind

This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include codes fromhttp://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/hl7TermMaintInfra where concept is-a MIF-ConceptRelationshipKind

This value set excludes codes based on the following rules:

  • Exclude these codes as defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/hl7TermMaintInfra
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    MIF-ConceptRelationshipKindGrouper code for MIF SupportedConceptRelationship.relationshipKind codes

name: MIFConceptRelationshipKind
title: MIF Concept Relationship Kind
description: Codes for use in the ext-mif-relationship-relationshipKind to capture V3 Model Interchange Format (MIF) SupportedConceptRelationship.relationshipKind values
